answers.answer: Hello dear and welcome to the medhelp forum. There could be various causes for numbness in the finger. It is not related to the ankle injury.  injury to the nerve from neck injury or locally in the finger, pressure on peripheral nerve from some sort of scar or infection, herpes zoster infection, diabetes and part of peripheral neuropathy, hypothyroidism, due to carpal tunnel syndrome, dyselectrolytemia. Vitamin B12 deficiency and as an effect of some medicines that you could be taking. Consult a physician for immediate evaluation and appropriate management. Best wishes.warmth, redness, itching or tingling
